section.title: Collecting messages using the RFC3164 protocol
section.para: The network() source driver can receive syslog messages conforming to RFC3164 from the network using the TCP, TLS, UDP networking protocols as well as the RLTP protocol. It is only possible to use the RLTP protocol by using the new format of the network() source driver when setting up a TCP source.

The old format is still in use, however, it is advised to use the new format if you intend to use the RLTP protocol. For details about the RLTP protocol, see . In the following examples the old and the new format is described.
